brief_summary: This study was designed to evaluate consistency in the antibody response to three manufactured lots of an investigational Rotavirus Vaccine.
description:
Placebo-matching RotaTeq™ administered at 3 separate visits scheduled 4 to 10
weeks (28 to 70 days) apart with up to 42 days of safety follow up after each vaccination
criteria: Inclusion Criteria: - Healthy infants Exclusion Criteria: - History of abdominal disorders from a birth defect, intussusception, or abdominal surgery - Known or suspected problems with the immune system - Fever at time of immunization - Prior administration of a rotavirus vaccine - History of known prior rotavirus disease, chronic diarrhea, or failure to thrive.
